definition: to loiter (i.e. reluctant to leave)/to linger on
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to linger/to remain enjoying oneself and forget to go home

sentences.english: I wanted to watch him mosey.
Troubled linger didnt come home on spring flowers, small qian to comfort.
sentences.chinese: 春花心事重重，流連在外沒有回家，小倩前來安慰。

sentences.english: A lonely fifty night had nothing linger on.
sentences.chinese: 這一個人的暮晚卻無心流連。

sentences.english: Toward the Qin Shi, the number of people who proudly interest, flocked to forget.
sentences.chinese: 向着石琴，多少人興致昂然，絡繹不絕，流連忘返。

sentences.english: Additionally, various books and magazines are available for your convenience, making you enjoy your waiting time.
sentences.chinese: 另配各類書籍雜誌，讓等候也變得流連忘返。

sentences.english: Guoqin heart go wander in the spring.
I got carried away in Dean & DeLuca last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我在迪安和德魯卡的食品雜貨店流連忘返。

sentences.english: The fragrance of extending paddy fields makes foreign tourists linger on and forget to return.
sentences.chinese: 千畝稻田香兩岸，令人流連忘返。

sentences.english: For life goes not backward nor tarries with yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 因爲生命不會後退，也不會在昨日流連。

sentences.english: I dreamed a dream in time gone by, when hope was high and life worth living.
sentences.chinese: 曾幾何時，我流連夢境，心比天高，人生充滿希望。

sentences.english: Haunted by monkeys and by deer.
Dreams lingered by my side long.
sentences.chinese: 夢想縈繞身邊流連忘返。

sentences.english: Mid pleasures and palaces though we may roam.
sentences.chinese: 我們也許會流連在歡樂與金璧輝煌中。

sentences.english: Both diffuse hard to forget, but also dense with people narcissism.
sentences.chinese: 既能瀰漫的讓人流連忘返，又能氤氳着使人自我陶醉。

sentences.english: They are dancers, their street dance impressed us deeply.
sentences.chinese: 他們的街舞讓大家流連忘返。

sentences.english: When we come to the beach, blue sea that makes us linger.
sentences.chinese: 當我們來到海邊，那蔚藍的海洋會讓我們流連忘返。

definition: lanterns red, wine green (idiom); feasting and pleasure-seeking/debauched and corrupt environment
